channel.title: Idea's For My Server
channel.description:
[ul] Alright title says it all
These are what I already have on my server:
-Magic only uses runes(so magic isnt so easy to gain) -Not to slow not to high Xp -Can only get Barrows from Barrows brothers -Added Premium so you need a premium account to access and wield: [list][li]Dwarf Battleaxe (best weapon in game[/li] [li]Portal that takes you to Abyssal Demon(only where to get whip beside people), Kalphite Queen(drops 3rd Age Armour) and Jad(only where to get fire cape beside people)[/li] [/list] -Runecrafting -SKILL CAPES!! -Mining -Cant log out until 30 seconds after combat -Alot of Silabs items like Darkbow, 3rd Age Armour, Dragon Battleaxe etc.. -
Server is not near complete so I need alot more ideas.[/ul]

item.title: Idea's For My Server
item.dc:creator: @Death31 Death31
item.description:
@Death31 wrote:

[ul] Alright title says it all

These are what I already have on my server:

-Magic only uses runes(so magic isnt so easy to gain)
-Not to slow not to high Xp
-Can only get Barrows from Barrows brothers
-Added Premium so you need a premium account to access and wield:
[list][li]Dwarf Battleaxe (best weapon in game[/li]
[li]Portal that takes you to Abyssal Demon(only where to get whip beside people), Kalphite Queen(drops 3rd Age Armour) and Jad(only where to get fire cape beside people)[/li]
[/list]
-Runecrafting
-SKILL CAPES!!
-Mining
-Cant log out until 30 seconds after combat
-Alot of Silabs items like Darkbow, 3rd Age Armour, Dragon Battleaxe etcâ€¦

Server is not near complete so I need alot more ideas.[/ul]
